faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Can I replace the graphics card
faq.answer: No. The graphics card is not upgradable. This model is not user upgradable. All work on this device must be performed by a certified technician, so as to not void the warranty

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  How accurate is the colours on this laptop?
faq.answer: Very accurate, upto 98% sRGB coverage.

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  What is the resolution?
faq.answer: This model ships with a 15.6 Inch FHD (1920 X 1080) IPS Display screen

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  How can you determine which docking stations or docking adapters work for this laptop?
faq.answer: There is no dedicated dock for this model. You can use a USB universal port replicator to achieve similar results.

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  where can I get the requiried sata cables for installing extra ssd?
faq.answer: Any place including Amazon that sells tech supplies. Prefer Amazon Basics.

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Hi. This laptop comes with i5 9300h gtx 1650 and 512gb nvme ssd?
faq.answer: Yes, model number 81LK00HDUS, ships with the Intel Core i5-9300H processor, the Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 GPU w/4GB GDDR5 dedicated RAM on the card, and a 512GB M.2 NVMe solid state hard drive

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  What is voltage for charger? 110v or 220v?
faq.answer: This device ships with a dual voltage AV adapter, with a USA compatible wall side plug

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Is there a slot empty for an hdd, currently the SSD size is too small for me and would like to know if there is anyway to add a hard drive ?
faq.answer: This model is not user upgradable. All work on this device must be performed by a certified technician, so as to not void the warranty. We recommend you consult your certified technician about your storage upgrade options

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  could it be send to Colombia? are taxes includes with payment?
faq.answer: yes, the taxes are ~USD200. In Lenovo Colombia, the model they sell has GTX1050, this one has the GTX1650, so it's the same price but this one is better.

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Can I upgrade RAM?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade upto 32bg. But go to a Service centre, as upgrading RAM on your own will void the warranty.

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Would it work well for autocad?
faq.answer: Probably yes. Mine can run Hell Let Loose with every graphical setting set to max and at a stable 40 fps

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Is the hard drive 1tb?
faq.answer: The Lenovo IdeaPad L340-15 Gaming Laptop, model number 81LK00HDUS, ships with a 512GB M.2 NVMe solid state hard drive. The maximum RAM this configuration can support is 16GB. faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  how many fan does this laptop have (i5 version) ?
faq.answer: The Lenovo L340-15 Gaming laptop, model number 81LK00HDUS, has two fans one Heat Sink. Lenovo Representative Manufacturer · November 9, 2019

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  If the laptop only has one hard disk drive with a solid state interface, why does it say it has a speed of 7200rpm? Contradiction?
faq.answer: The Lenovo IdeaPad L340-15 Gaming Laptop, model number 81LK00HDUS, ships with one hard drive. A solid state M.2 NVMe format 512GB hard drive

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does this option actually come with the GTX 1650 graphics card or the GTX 1050?
faq.answer: Model number 81LK00HDUS, the Lenovo IdeaPad L340 Gaming Laptop ships with the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 GPU

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  I'm a simple person, i just want to play minecraft without loss of fps... can this handle minecraft, no mods, just the base game??
faq.answer: That will depend on the requirements and compatibility of the specific game. faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Cuáles son sus especificaciones?
faq.answer: Core i5-9300h, 8gb Ram, 512gb SSD, gpu envidia 1650. Great laptop. We use it for Architecture

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  La grafica es una 1650 o una 1050 ti?
faq.answer: El modelo Lenovo L340-15 número 81LK00HDUS se entrega con la GPU NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650. Lenovo Representative Manufacturer · January 21, 2020

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Can someone else besides the manufacturer confirm the laptops does indeed have a 1650 and not a 1050 becuase I can't even find a 1650 varient?
faq.answer: Yes I can confirm that. I bought that laptop 2 weeks ago and it has indeed 1650. Model number is L340-15IRH, and product number 81LK

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  For wireless connection it only states bluetooth. Does it include wi-fi connectivity?
faq.answer: Yes. This model ships with the latest %G 802.11AC frequency WiFi

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Will this play simms 4 without degradation. i'm hoping for a great christmas gift for my wife on my limited finances?
faq.answer: I'm playing The Sims 4 and it goes smoothly well all times

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  is there individual key lighting?
faq.answer: The Lenovo IdeaPad L340-15 Gaming Laptop, model number 81LK00HDUS, has a backlit keyboard

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  International warrenty ???
faq.answer: No. There is no International Warranty on this North American model

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does the manufaturer provide international warrant on this model?
faq.answer: No. This is a North American Model and ships with a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty, valid in North America only

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  What device/monitor outputs does it have? Not listed and cannot see in the pictures.
faq.answer: The Lenovo IdeaPad L340-15, model number 81LK00HDUS has two standard USB 3.0 ports, one USB-c 3.0 port, one HDMI-Out port, one ethernet RJ-45 port, one Kensington Lock port, one 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Has a 60hz display?
faq.answer: Yes, that is correct

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does it work with 220v ? If not does the adapter need to be a converter from 110v to 220v ?
faq.answer: This model ships with a dual voltage AC adapter/charger, with a USA compatible wall side plug. To use this device outside the USA, you will nee a wall side plug adapter compatible with the country you want to use the computer in

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does this laptop have a SD card reader?
faq.answer: No. There is no SD card reader on this model

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Can this be charged via the USB port?
faq.answer: No. This model uses a dedicated AC power port. There is no charging capability through the USB-c port

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Would this handle Oculus link Vr? It's in beta mode still was wondering if it will meet the requirements
faq.answer: Yes, this video card exceeds to minimum requirements for the Oculus Link VR system. Paul W

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  I thought i bought the protection plan with the laptop. can i still order it? it seems like a lot more money now. the laptop is a christmas gift
faq.answer: Check Lenovo Support website. I think you can buy Protection Plan and extend warranty from there

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Whats the hard disk size of this laptop? luke 1tb or 2tb?
faq.answer: The Lenovo IdeaPad L340-15 Gaming Laptop, model number 81LK00HDUS, ships with a 512GB M.2 NVMe solid state hard drive. Lenovo Representative Manufacturer · November 21, 2019

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  what WiFi standard does it support?
faq.answer: This model ships with the latest 5G 2x2 802.11AC frequency WiFi. 802.11AC is backward compatible to the older b/g/n frequencies as well

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does this model actually have a gtx 1650? for $600!!!!
faq.answer: Yes, this configuration ships with the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 GPU. Lenovo Representative Manufacturer · September 9, 2019

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Can I add another nvme drive to this model?
faq.answer: This model is not user upgradable. All work on this device must be performed by a certified technician, so as to not void the warranty. We recommend you consult your certified technician about your storage upgrade options

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  can I upgarde HDD / hard disk?
faq.answer: Yes. It ships with an extra RAM slot and a 2.5 bay for a hard drive. Please keep in mind, This model is not user upgradable. All work on this device must be performed by a certified technician, so as to not void the warranty.

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does it work with 220v?
faq.answer: The computer is a 110V device. It does ship with a dual voltage AC adapter with a North American wall plug. To use the computer outside North America, you will need a wall side plug adapter, compatible with the country you want to use the computer in

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Does it have a RJ45 gigabit ethernet?
faq.answer: Yes. The Lenovo L340-15 model number 81LK00HDUS, ships with an ethernet port built in

faq.question: Lenovo Ideapad L340  Will this work with all the game apps for rift, rift s and quest with link software installed?
faq.answer: Could check it out in '' can you run it '' website. Otherwise I'm not sure. It's pretty powerful for this price range and can handle most modern games, not on the highest setting but would be able to run it
